location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '29'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Bahrein (Bahrain) of the ‘Tombs’, burial mounds dating to the Dilmun, Umm an-Nar and later cultures. The mounds extend into the far distance. At left three men and two donkeys are just visible in the photograph.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Bahrein.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘29’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘The Tombs’, ‘(Feb. 1918)’
